name: This is my dungeon !
description:
The goblins have come to plunder your treasures!

You are a demon in a dungeon with magical powers, so you are ready to defend your treasure with your fireballs and traps. The more goblins you kill, the more magic points you'll get, which you can spend to set traps and even buy new traps like a saw, a flamethrower, a mine and crates to block them... 

This game was made on Unreal Engine 4 in c++, during three weeks by four Game Programmer during our second year of study at Isart Digital
